title: Why don't Supports ever engage the enemy?
body:
Hi guys,

Normally, I'm on the side of saying the female champions shouldn't HAVE TO "support" the males, meaning to give them all their money, food, and experience.

However, this is about the INVERSE, which is when we have a Support that ONLY WANTS to sit back and never attack, and never bothers to save you when there's 2 (TWO) OF THEM TOGETHER at full HP.

A Support is supposed to stay back-line to help you take out champions, set you and others up for kills, and pick off guys that your teammate injured!  You can say the Support is the "Big Brother" of the team!

What do you all think?
